resources.description: A Marketplace REST Api developed in NodeJS
resources.name: marketplace-api

resources.description:
**[POST]** /users
--
**Response:** Status 201 Created

Request Body Model
--
>**name (String)**  
>**required:** true  

>**email (String)**  
>**required:** true  

>**password (String)**  
>**required:** true  
>**minlength:** 6  

```json
{
  "name": "Name",
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "password": "password"
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
  "name": "Name",
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
}
```
resources.name: [PUBLIC] Create

resources.description:
**[POST]** /auth
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Request Body Model
--
>**email (String)**  
>**required:** true  

>**password (String)**  
>**required:** true  

```json
{
  "email": "email@example.com",
  "password": "password"
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "user": {
    "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
    "name": "Name",
    "email": "email@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
  },
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjV
  jOGRkNWIyNDA2YmZmNzFiYzYxMzkzNCIsImlhdCI6MTU1Mjc5OTIyMiwiZ
  XhwIjoxNTUyO Dg1NjIyfQ.zM4a5H3IittO8Wf3tBw9-rgylpWgCgMZBGI
  tOHE_VYs"
}
```
resources.name: [PUBLIC] Auth

resources.description:
**[GET]** /ads
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Query Params
--
>**includePurchased (Boolean)**  
>**required:** false  
>**default:** false  

>**page (Number)**  
>**required:** false  
>**default:** 1  

>**pageSize (Number)**  
>**required:** false  
>**default:** 10  

>**minPrice (Number)**  
>**required:** false  
>**default:** null  

>**maxPrice (Number)**  
>**required:** false  
>**default:** null  

>**title (String)**  
>**required:** false  
>**default:** null  

Response Model
--
```json
{
  "total": 1,
  "limit": 10,
  "page": 1,
  "pages": 1,
  "ads": [
    {
      "_id": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
      "title": "Title",
      "description": "Description",
      "price": 0,
      "author": {
        "_id": "5c8edfc2692fa5b753380820",
        "name": "Ad Author name",
        "email": "email1@example.com",
        "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:06.264Z"
      },
      "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:44.569Z",
      "purchasedBy": {
        "_id": "5c8ee053692fa5b753380823",
        "ad": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
        "message": "Message",
        "author": {
          "_id": "5c8edfcd692fa5b753380821",
          "name": "Purchase Author Name",
          "email": "email2@example.com",
          "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:17.080Z"
        },
        "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:03:31.824Z"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```
resources.name: [PRIVATE] List

resources.description:
**[GET]** /ads/:id
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Params
--
>**id (String | ObjectId)**  
>**required:** true  
>**description:** the Ad id  

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
  "title": "Title",
  "description": "Description",
  "price": 0,
  "author": {
    "_id": "5c8edfc2692fa5b753380820",
    "name": "Ad Author Name",
    "email": "email1@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:06.264Z"
  },
  "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:44.569Z",
  "purchasedBy": {
    "_id": "5c8ee053692fa5b753380823",
    "ad": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
    "message": "Message",
    "author": {
      "_id": "5c8edfcd692fa5b753380821",
      "name": "Purchase Author Name",
      "email": "email2@example.com",
      "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:17.080Z"
    },
    "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:03:31.824Z"
  }
}
```
resources.name: [PRIVATE] Show

resources.description:
**[POST]** /ads
--
**Response:** Status 201 Created

Request Body Model
--
>**title (String)**  
>**required:** true  

>**description (String)**  
>**required:** true  

>**price (Number)**  
>**required:** true  

```json
{
 "title": "Title",
 "description": "Description",
 "price": 0
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
  "title": "Title",
  "description": "Description",
  "price": 0,
  "author": {
    "_id": "5c8edfc2692fa5b753380820",
    "name": "Name",
    "email": "email@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:06.264Z"
  },
  "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:44.569Z"
}
```

resources.description:
**[PUT]** /ads/:id
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Params
--
>**id (String | ObjectId)**  
>**required:** true  
>**description:** the Ad id  

Request Body Model
--
>**title (String)**  
>**required:** false  

>**description (String)**  
>**required:** false  

>**price (Number)**  
>**required:** false  

```json
{
 "title": "New Title",
 "description": "New Description",
 "price": 0
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
  "title": "New Title",
  "description": "New Description",
  "price": 0,
  "author": {
    "_id": "5c8edfc2692fa5b753380820",
    "name": "Ad Author Name",
    "email": "email1@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:06.264Z"
  },
  "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:44.569Z",
  "purchasedBy": {
    "_id": "5c8ee053692fa5b753380823",
    "ad": "5c8edfe8692fa5b753380822",
    "message": "Message",
    "author": {
      "_id": "5c8edfcd692fa5b753380821",
      "name": "Purchase Author Name",
	    "email": "email2@example.com",
      "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:01:17.080Z"
    },
    "createdAt": "2019-03-18T00:03:31.824Z"
  }
}
```

resources.description:
**[DELETE]** /ads/:id
--
**Response:** Status 204 No Content

Params
--
>**id (String | ObjectId)**  
>**required:** true  
>**description:** the Ad id  

Request Body Model
--
*No body needed for request*

Response Payload Model
--
*No body returned for response*
resources.name: [PRIVATE] Delete

resources.description:
**[POST]** /purchases
--
**Response:** Status 200 OK

Request Body Model
--
>**ad (String | ObjectId)**  
>**required:** true  
>**description:** the Ad id  

>**message (String)**  
>**required:** true  

```json
{
  "ad": "5c8db75daf943e698707b7ce",
  "message": "Message"
}
```

Response Payload Model
--
```json
{
  "_id": "5c8ed74a3001e0b370abd241",
  "ad": {
    "_id": "5c8eb80928e5fea73f236b4f",
    "title": "Title",
    "description": "Description",
    "price": 0,
    "author": {
      "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
      "name": "Ad Author Name",
      "email": "email1@example.com",
      "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
    },
    "createdAt": "2019-03-17T21:11:37.150Z"
  },
  "message": "Message",
  "author": {
    "_id": "5c8dd5b2406bff71bc613934",
    "name": "Purchase Author Name",
    "email": "email2@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2019-03-17T05:05:54.051Z"
  },
  "createdAt": "2019-03-17T23:24:58.962Z"
}
```
